document_data.mainbody:
elina Tatch was a priestess on a quest to release tortured spirits of the undead from their cursed existence sometime before 1372 DR.
Felina used her enchanted flail called Last Rest in her righteous pursuit. Eventually, the priestess met her doom at the hands of the vampire Milikaia, who slew Felina and turned her into a fellow blood-sucking undead. Sometime later, Felina was seen wandering the graveyard of her hometown, still destroying the undead. Milikaias fate remain unknown.
